summary: DataConverter error when receiving empty values with regular Workflow Stubs in PHP SDK. Previously reported issue #442 was not fully resolved for this use case.
userImpact: Users experience crashes when receiving empty array payloads from Go SDK due to missing DataConverter configuration.
rootCause: DataConverter validation occurs even for empty payloads that don't require decoding, causing errors with Typed Workflow Stubs.
workaround: Use Untyped Workflow Stub instead of regular Stub to avoid the error.
resolutionDetails: Issue was resolved in a subsequent update to properly handle empty payloads without requiring DataConverter.
keyQuote: After some recent updates PHP SDK begin to fail on empty array payloads from Golang SDK, while we get EncodedValues their payloads are empty
